文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: A material development project was initiated to develop a new zirconium alloy, outside the ASTM specifications for Zircaloy-2 and Zircaloy-4, with optimized hydriding and corrosion properties for both boiling water reactors and pressurized water reactors.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: These alloys were long-term corrosion tested in autoclaves at 400°C in steam.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: Also, a 520°C/24 h steam test was carried out.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: These materials were then tested for corrosion performance in 400 and 520°C steam.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: TWCA melted small ingots, approximately 2 x 8 in weight, by the induction-slag melting process.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: The ingots were pre-heated to about 1020°C for 20 min prior to forging.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: All strips were delivered in re-crystallized annealed condition.

证据片段: The second-phase particles found in the different materials were of three kinds: (1) $\mathbf { Z } \mathbf { r } _ { 2 }$ (Ni,Fe) tetragonal type, (2) ${ \bf Z r ( C r , F e ) } _ { 2 }$ hexagonal type, and (3) Zr-Si.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk4
证据片段: the nickel content in the investigated alloys is ranging from 400 to 2400 ppm (Table 1)

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: Uniform oxide mainly consists of m-ZrO2 and a smaller fraction of t-ZrO2 with columnar grains and some amount of equiaxed crystallites.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: Nodular oxides show a high open porosity and the grain shape tends to the equiaxed type.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: A fine network of pores along grain boundaries was found in oxides grown in water containing lithium.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: In all oxides, a compact, voidfree oxide layer was observed at the metal/oxide interface.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: Electrical potential measurements on oxide scales showed the influence of the intermetallic precipitates on the potential drop across the oxide.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: In long-time corrosion tests of Zircaloy with varying temperatures, memory effects caused by the cyclic formation of barrier layers could be observed.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_035_chunk5
证据片段: It was concluded that the corrosion mechanism of zirconium-based alloys is a barrier-layer controlled process. The protective properties of this barrier layer determine the overall corrosion resistance of zirconium alloys.
